means: 小型的，比标准的要小一些的

sentence.Network_en: The new pint - size, portable TV set has a very clear picture.
sentence.Network_cn: 这架新的手提式小电视机有很清晰的画面.

sentence.Network_en: The new pint - size, potable TV sets made in China have a very clear picture.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些中国生产的新的手提式小型电视机的画面很清晰.

sentence.Network_en: Each brick also varies slightly in tone, texture and size.
sentence.Network_cn: 每块砖在色调、质地与大小上也都略有不同。

these pint sized frogs aren't for kissing . their backs ooze a slimy neurotoxin that is meant to keep predators away . each frog produces enough of the toxin to kill 10 humans .这些一品脱大小的蛙类，你可不能吻它们。它们的背上会渗出粘液状的神经毒素，让猎食者敬而远之。每只蛙分泌的毒素可以杀死10个人。
how to construct a pint - sized campus network ., 如何构建小型校园网络.
while stunts are grabbing the spotlight , they are also raising questions as to whether the pint-sized athlete's safety is at risk .当这项特技吸引了他们的关注的同时，他们也对这个小运动员的安全问题提出了疑问。
